summary: An FBI Agent pairs with a troubled Taiwan cop to hunt for a serial killer who's embedding a mysterious fungus in the brains of victims.
cast: Tony Ka Fai Leung|David Morse|Rene Liu|Leon Dai|Kuei-Mei Yang|Sihung Lung|Brett Climo|Wei-Han Huang|Han Chang|Akio Chen|Hui-Hui Chiang|King Chin|Heng-Yin Chou|De-Hai Chu|Judy Ya-Hsin Ko|Hannah Lin|Ming-Yuen Lin|David Newell|David Ross Paterson|Doug Penty|Ye-Ming Wang|Pong Fong Wu|Hui-Chih Yeh|Angus McLaren
title: Doble visión
